description.name: Submersible Transfer Pump Diesel Water Oil 12V 37mm
description.long_desc:
The 12V Submersible pump can be used for rapid diesel refueling, water and thin oils transfer from storage tanks to various vehicles with no spillage.


NOT to be used with petrol, alcohol, bio diesel, diesel substitute or any other flammable liquid/fuel.


Product Features



  • Voltage 12V DC

  • Suitable for Diesel, Oil and Water

  • On/Off inline switch + 2x alligator clips

  • 19 mm hose tail connection

  • Centrifugal impeller

  • Includes 3 m hose


Technical Data



  • Power: 40W

  • No-load Speed: 8,500 rpm

  • Maximum Suction Lift: 3 m

  • Flow Rate: up to 15 L/min

  • Pump Diameter: 37 mm

  • Cable Length: 2,5 m

description.name: Self-priming 12V DC Diesel Transfer Pump
description.long_desc:
Self-priming 12V DC Diesel Transfer Pump with direct transmission and inner recirculation to extend pump life. Ideal for transferring diesel, light oils and kerosene. Cast-iron pump casing, treated against corrosion and paint-finished.


NOT to be used with petrol, alcohol, bio diesel, diesel substitute or any other flammable liquid/fuel.


Product Features



  • Voltage 12V DC

  • Suitable for Diesel, Oil and Kerosene

  • On/Off switch

  • Inlet and outlet diameter: 3/4"

  • Inner bypass valve

  • Includes 2x alligator clips, 2x connectors with seals, 1x micro mesh filter


Technical Data



  • Power: 155W

  • Input Voltage:

  • No-load Speed: 2,800 rpm

  • Continuous Duty Cycle: 30 minutes

  • Maximum Suction Lift: 3 m

  • Self-priming up to 10 m above liquid level

  • Flow Rate: up to 15 L/min

  • Inlet and Outlet Diameter: 3/4"

  • Mounting Base:


Package Contents:



  • 1x 12V DC Self-priming Electric Pump

  • 2x alligator clips

  • 2x connectors with seals

  • 1x micro mesh filter

description.name: Self-priming Electric Oil Transfer Pump Dispensing Kit 600W
description.long_desc:
Self-priming 230V Electric Diesel Transfer Pump 600W with direct transmission and inner recirculation to extend pump life. Ideal for transferring diesel, light oils and kerosene. Cast-iron pump casing, treated against corrosion and paint-finished.


NOT to be used with petrol, alcohol, bio diesel, diesel substitute or any other flammable liquid/fuel.


Product Features



  • Voltage 230V AC

  • Powerful engine with 600W

  • Self-prime unit with one way suction valve

  • Robust auto shut-off fuel nozzle

  • Handy nozzle holder

  • Flexible, long life hoses

  • 2m clear suction hose strengthened with wire winding

  • 4m non-clear delivery hose

  • Inlet and outlet diameter: 1"

  • Inclusive of non-return valve

  • Versatile usage for Oil, Diesel Petrol and Kerosene

  • High output rate up to 2400 l/h

  • The 3 digits mechanical flow meter indicates the current flow up to 999 litre and the 6 digits totaliser up to 999.999 litre (not resettable)

  • With 2 brass connections

  • 4m non-clear delivery hose


Technical Data



  • Power: 600W

  • Input Voltage: 230V

  • Overflow Valve: Yes

  • Filter: Yes

  • No-load Speed: 2,800 rpm

  • Continuous Duty Cycle: 60 minutes

  • Maximum Suction Lift: 4 m

  • Self-priming up to 15 m above liquid level

  • Flow Rate: up to 40 L/min

  • Inlet and Outlet Diameter: 1"


Package Contents:



  • 1x 230V DC Self-priming Electric Pump

  • 1x suction hose 2 m

  • 1x delivery hose 4 m

  • 4x connectors with seals

  • 1x micro mesh filter

description.name: Oil Sump Pump 12V
description.long_desc:
Product Features



  • Voltage 12V DC

  • Powerful 100W engine

  • Suitable for Diesel and Oil

  • Two flexible hoses

  • High output by Diesel 5 L/min

  • Extraction hose length 125 cm

  • Dump hose length 155 cm


Warning: Do not pump cold engine oil. This may cause a damage of the pump, because the oil is to thick.


Package Contents:



  • 1 x Oil sump pump

  • 1 x Operation instruction

  • 2 x Hoses

  • 2 x Hose terminals

  • 2 x Power terminals

description.name: Fuel Nozzle With LCD Digital Flow Meter
description.long_desc:
Ideal for fuel dispensing within the agricultural and plant markets where mobile refuelling is common. Strong die cast aluminium body complete with removable lever protection and an integral hook for hanging without a holster.


Product Features



  • Digital turbine fuel flow meter

  • LCD electronic display with 5 digit partial and 6 digit totaliser

  • Removable lever protection

  • Integral hook for hanging without a holster


Technical Data



  • Medium: Diesel, Engine Oil

  • Inlet Size: 1" BSP

  • Flow Rate: 20 - 60 L/min

  • Operating Temperature: from -10°C to +60°C

  • Flow Meter Accuracy: +/- 0,2%

description.name: Digital meter for diesel pump
description.long_desc:
High accuracy digital turbine fuel flow meter.


Product Features



  • High accuracy

  • Digital turbine fuel flow meter

  • LCD electronic display with 5 digit partial and 6 digit totaliser

  • Power supply: 2x R3 AAA batteries

  • Standby time: 2 years


Technical Data



  • Medium: Diesel, Engine Oil, Kerosene

  • Inlet Size: 1" BSP

  • Flow Range: 10 - 120 L/min

  • Single count: 0.00 - 999.9

  • The total cumulative number: 0.00 - 999999.9

  • Flow Meter Accuracy: ±1,0%

  • Repeatability: ±0,5%

  • Operating Voltage: 2,3 - 3,3V

  • Maximum Working Pressure: 10 bar

  • Unit: litre / L, gal / GAL, pint / PTS, quart / QTS

description.name: Particle Fuel Tank Filter 1" BSP
description.long_desc:
Fuel Filter function is to gets rid of particles such as dirt, dust and debris.


Product Features



  • Suitable for diesel, gasoline, and ethanol or methanol blends up to 10%

  • Use with low-volume commercial power pumps

  • 30 micron cannister filter

  • 1" DN25 Female BSP Flanged Inlet/Outlet

  • Filter thread 1 1/2"-16UNF


Technical Data



  • Filtration Rating: 30 micron

  • Filtration Media: resin-impregnated cellulose paper media

  • Max. Working Pressure: 3,4 bar / 50 PSI

  • Longevity: more than 300 hours


Package Contents:



  • 1 x Filter head

  • 1 x Filter element

description.name: Professional Automatic Diesel Nozzle 1" BSP PROFI
description.long_desc:
Automatic Diesel Nozzle is designed for the non-resale refuelling of cars and commercial vehicles thanks to its small spout diameter. The Nozzle will shut off when the vehicle tank is at capacity.


Product Features



  • Auto Shut-off function

  • Flow rate up to 80 L/min

  • Supplied with 1" Female BSP Swivel (360°)

  • Diameter of spout 25 mm


Technical Data



  • Medium: Diesel, Engine Oil, Kerosene

  • Inlet Size: 1" BSP

  • Max Flow Rate: 80 L/min

  • For non-resale refuelling applications

description.name: Electric Diesel Transfer Pump 550W 230V
description.long_desc:
Self-priming 230V Electric Diesel Transfer Pump with direct transmission and inner recirculation to extend pump life. Ideal for transferring diesel, light oils and kerosene. Cast-iron pump casing, treated against corrosion and paint-finished.


NOT to be used with petrol, alcohol, bio diesel, diesel substitute or any other flammable liquid/fuel.


Product Features



  • Voltage 230V AC

  • Powerful 550W engine

  • Vane pump with steel rotor

  • Suitable for Diesel, Oil and Kerosene

  • On/Off switch

  • Inlet and outlet diameter: 1"

  • Inner bypass valve

  • Built-in 100 micron filter, easily accessible for cleaning

  • Includes 2x alligator clips, 2x connectors with seals, 1x micro mesh filter


Technical Data



  • Power: 550W

  • Input Voltage: 230V

  • No-load Speed: 2,800 rpm

  • Continuous Duty Cycle: 60 minutes

  • Maximum Suction Lift: 3 m

  • Self-priming up to above liquid level

  • Flow Rate: up to 30 L/min

  • Inlet and Outlet Diameter: 1"

  • 2x alligator clips

description.name: Hand Diesel Fuel Pump 10 mm
description.long_desc:
Diesel Fuel Pump Priming Tool is suitable for priming fluids on diesel engines. It is most commonly used on outboard or inboard boat engines. Ideal for introducing fuel into the fuel pump after replacement of the fuel filter.


Product Features



  • Works on the vacuum principle

  • One-way only function

  • Connects to any length of hose


Technical Data



  • Overall Length: 150 mm

  • Input Connectors: 10 mm

description.name: Hand Diesel Fuel Pump 12 mm
description.long_desc:
Diesel Fuel Pump Priming Tool is suitable for priming fluids on diesel engines. It is most commonly used on outboard or inboard boat engines. Ideal for introducing fuel into the fuel pump after replacement of the fuel filter.


Product Features



  • Works on the vacuum principle

  • One-way only function

  • Connects to any length of hose


Technical Data



  • Overall Length: 150 mm

  • Input Connectors: 12 mm

description.name: Ratchet Pipe Threading Set 4pcs from 1/2 to 1-1/4 in.
description.long_desc:
Ratchet Pipe Threading Set is suitable for threading black gas or galvanized iron pipes.


Product Features



  • Cast Iron construction with four alloy steel (HRC 58-62) chasers per head

  • Pipe capacity from 1/2 to 1-1/4 inches

  • Each die head has four swarf removal holes


Package Contents:



  • Plastic case

  • Ratchet head / hand assembly

  • Die heads: 1/2", 3/4", 1", 1-1/4" BSP

description.name: Self-priming 24V DC Diesel Transfer Pump
description.long_desc:
Self-priming 24V DC Diesel Transfer Pump with direct transmission and inner recirculation to extend pump life. Ideal for transferring diesel, light oils and kerosene. Cast-iron pump casing, treated against corrosion and paint-finished.


NOT to be used with petrol, alcohol, bio diesel, diesel substitute or any other flammable liquid/fuel.


Product Features



  • Voltage 24V DC

  • Suitable for Diesel, Oil and Kerosene

  • On/Off switch

  • Inlet and outlet diameter: 3/4"

  • Inner bypass valve

  • Includes 2x alligator clips, 2x connectors with seals, 1x micro mesh filter


Technical Data



  • Power: 155W

  • Input Voltage: 12V

  • No-load Speed: 2,800 rpm

  • Continuous Duty Cycle: 30 minutes

  • Maximum Suction Lift: 3 m

  • Self-priming up to 10 m above liquid level

  • Flow Rate: up to 40 L/min

  • Inlet and Outlet Diameter: 3/4"


Package Contents:



  • 1x 24V DC Self-priming Electric Pump

  • 2x alligator clips

  • 2x connectors with seals

  • 1x micro mesh filter

description.name: Rotary Hand Fuel Pump 3-parts
description.long_desc:
Rotary Hand Fuel Pump is an economical and simple solution for the manual dispensing of diesel and oil primarily from a drum. This transfer pump is equipped with a 2” Male BSP barrel adaptor and three part rigid suction downtube (L=1000mm).


Product Features



  • Hand operated

  • Use on barrels, drums and small tanks

  • Cast iron construction

  • 3 part 1 m length suction down tube

  • suction piple 1" diameter

  • 25 mm bent dispensing spout

  • 2” BSP barrel adaptor

  • Max. flow rate up to 25 litres per minute

  • Suitable for drums up to 210 litres


Technical Data



  • Medium: all grades of oil, diesel, kerosene, hydraulic fluid, lubricating oil, antifreeze (ethylene glycol), other non-corrosive liquids

  • Fitting: 2” BSP barrel adaptor

  • Suction Pipe Length: 1000 mm

  • Overall Length: 1270 mm

  • Viscosity: 440 cSt / SAE30

  • Material: Cast iron, sinter steel, nitrile

description.name: Lever Barrel Fuel Pump
description.long_desc:
Lever Hand Fuel Pump is an economical and simple solution for the manual dispensing of diesel and oil primarily from a drum. This transfer pump is equipped with a 1 1/2" and 2” Male BSP barrel adaptor and two part rigid suction telescopic downtube.


Product Features



  • Cushioned grip for easy, non-slip pumping

  • Use on barrels, drums and small tanks

  • Steel construction

  • Self-adjusting telescopic 450-870 mm down tube

  • 20 mm bent dispensing spout

  • 1 1/2" and 2” BSP barrel adaptor

  • Max. flow rate up to 330 ml per stroke (20 L/min)

  • Suitable for drums up to 210 litres


Technical Data



  • Medium: diesel, gear oil, engine oil and many other non-corrosive liquids

  • Fitting: 1 1/2" and 2” BSP barrel adaptor

  • Suction Pipe Length: 450 - 870 mm

  • Viscosity: 210 cSt / SAE 90

  • Material: steel, cast iron

description.name: Self-priming 12V DC Diesel Transfer Pump
description.long_desc:
Self-priming 12V DC Diesel Transfer Pump with direct transmission and inner recirculation to extend pump life. Ideal for transferring diesel, light oils and kerosene. Cast-iron pump casing, treated against corrosion and paint-finished.


NOT to be used with petrol, alcohol, bio diesel, diesel substitute or any other flammable liquid/fuel.


Product Features



  • Voltage 12V DC

  • Suitable for Diesel, Oil and Kerosene

  • On/Off switch

  • Inlet and outlet diameter: 3/4"

  • Inner bypass valve

  • Includes 2x alligator clips, 2x connectors with seals, 1x micro mesh filter


Technical Data



  • Power: 155W

  • Input Voltage: 12V

  • No-load Speed: 2,800 rpm

  • Continuous Duty Cycle: 30 minutes

  • Maximum Suction Lift: 3 m

  • Self-priming up to 10 m above liquid level

  • Flow Rate: up to 40 L/min

  • Inlet and Outlet Diameter: 3/4"


Package Contents:



  • 1x 12V DC Self-priming Electric Pump

  • 2x alligator clips

  • 2x connectors with seals

  • 1x micro mesh filter

description.name: Self-priming Electric Oil Transfer Pump Dispensing Kit 950W
description.long_desc:
Self-priming 230V Electric Diesel Transfer Pump 950W with direct transmission and inner recirculation to extend pump life. Ideal for transferring diesel, light oils and kerosene. Cast-iron pump casing, treated against corrosion and paint-finished.


NOT to be used with petrol, alcohol, bio diesel, diesel substitute or any other flammable liquid/fuel.


Product Features



  • Voltage 230V AC

  • Powerful engine with 950W

  • Self-prime unit with one way suction valve

  • Robust auto shut-off fuel nozzle

  • Handy nozzle holder

  • Flexible, long life hoses

  • 2m clear suction hose strengthened with wire winding

  • 4m non-clear delivery hose

  • Inlet and outlet diameter: 1"

  • Inclusive of non-return valve

  • Versatile usage for Oil, Diesel Petrol and Kerosene

  • High output rate up to 2400 l/h

  • The 4 digit mechanical flow meter indicates the current flow up to 9.999 litre and the 8 digits totaliser (not resettable)

  • With 2 brass connections

  • 4m non-clear delivery hose


Technical Data



  • Power: 950W

  • Input Voltage: 230V

  • Overflow Valve: Yes

  • Filter: Yes

  • No-load Speed: 2,800 rpm

  • Maximum Suction Lift: 4 m

  • Self-priming up to 15 m above liquid level

description.name: Mechanical Fuel Flow Meter for Diesel and Oil Transfer Pump
description.long_desc:
Mechanical Fuel Flow Meter suitable for diesel and oil transfer pump. These flow meters are reliable, easy to install and simple to calibrate on the workplace.


Product Features



  • Readout: 3-digit subtotal, 6-digit total

  • Accuracy: ±4-5%

  • Max. fluid temperature: 50°C

  • Max. flow rate up to 80 litre per minute

  • Max. pressure up to 3,5 bar

  • Connection 1" BSP

description.name: Automatic Fuel Nozzle 3/4" BSP for Oil/Diesel Transfer Pump
description.long_desc:
Automatic Diesel Nozzle is designed for the non-resale refuelling of cars and commercial vehicles thanks to its small spout diameter. The Nozzle will shut off when the vehicle tank is at capacity.


Product Features



  • Full hand insulator-protects both nozzle and vehicle, and insulates user's hands

  • Auto Shut-off function

  • Flow rate up to 80 L/min

  • Supplied with 3/4" Female BSP

  • Diameter of spout 24 mm

  • Three position hold open clip


Technical Data



  • Medium: Diesel, Engine Oil, Kerosene

  • Inlet Size: 3/4" BSP

  • Max Flow Rate: 80 L/min

  • For non-resale refuelling applications

description.short_desc:
Cast Iron Drill Press Vice 2.5" holding work pieces firmly in place for safe and accurate drilling. Ideal for drilling, tapping, reaming, grinding and milling.


Product Features



  • Strong cast iron body

  • Hardened steel jaws

  • 60mm jaws open up to 60mm with a 20mm throat depth

  • Four 1/2-inch mounting slots to securely fasten the vise to a drill press table

  • Machined spindle for smooth operation


Technical Data



  • Jaw Capacity: 60 mm

  • Jaw Height: 20 mm

  • Material: cast iron, steel
